name: Yanqiu Wu 0002
content: YWSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYanqiu (Autumn) WuBiographyI am Yanqiu (Autumn) Wu, currently employed as a Lecturer in Artificial Intelligence at Macquarie University, School of Computing. From October 2022 to January 2024, I was a CSIRO Early Research Career (CERC) Post-doctoral Fellow in the Distributed Systems Security group, Data61, CSIRO. My current research interests are in the fields of Quantum Machine Learning and Deep Reinforcement Learning. In September 2022, I completed my doctoral degree in Computer Science from New York University (NYU) under the guidance of Professor Keith W. Ross. During my PhD studies, I worked in the area of deep reinforcement learning. Prior to that, I received my B.S. degree from New York University Shanghai. Contacts yanqiu.wu@mq.edu.auyanqiu.wu@nyu.eduPublicationsPhD ThesisYanqiu Wu.
